      • loadFromFile

        public static ConfigDataSet loadFromFile(java.lang.String fileName)
                                  throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                         java.io.IOException
        Load a ConfigDataSet from a file Equivalent to calling ConfigFactory.loadFromFile(new File(fileName));
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the file to load
        Returns:
        The loaded configuration.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - when the file could not be located
        java.io.IOException - when a problem occurred reading from the file.
